demolition

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Bomb

  • public class Bomb
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reprsents the bomb for the demolition game. Bomb can be placed by the bomb guy i.e. and instance of BombGuy anywhere in the empty tile. It waits for 2 seconds to detonate and create the explosion by an instance of Explosion

      • draw

        public void draw(PApplet pApplet)
